nodes.text: Path of the Jedi was a browser game on Cartoon Network's Star Wars: The Clone Wars site. The player uses Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker, or Yoda to complete certain missions for other characters from The Clone Wars. It has three chapters: "Shadow of Grievous," "Assassin's Snare," and "Ambush on Vassek". The game is no longer available on the website.
